title: [LF] Scrim Partners. [Low/Mid/High Diamond-Master]
body:
Hey,

My name is Ungebildet and I'm looking for a few **Scrim-Partners** between **Low Diamond and Master**.
As I manage 4-5 teams currently it's obviously hard sometimes to get a scrim for each of them for each time.
So, to make it easier to me and to other teams / their managers to find a scrim I'm looking for a few more contacts that are reliable on and punctual teams.

_That said I only want people to add me who are able to cancel a scrim not just 2 minutes before it begins and people who are able to note down when their scrim is gonna take place and not just "forget about the deal" they made._

I can already tell that most scrims we're looking for should start at **6** or **7 PM CEST**.
Also, we **prefer non-German teams** to scrim against.

If you're interested please add me IG or post here so I'll add you.

Greetings,
Ungebildet
Team-Manager of AL and Tribunal eSports e.V.
